ComicInfo.Title: The Wrath of Odin!; The Reason Why!
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Wrath of Odin!: Thor surrenders to the police, Loki posts his bail and attacks him when alone. Sif and Balder intervene.
The Reason Why!: King Randac gains evergy powers from the Terrigen Mists and decrees that all of his subjects will be exposed to the Mists. The Sentry reveals that the Kree were responsible for the advanced scientific knowledge of Randac's people.
